about_the_game:
HECTIC KITCHEN ACTION

Are you ready to put your culinary skills to the test?  Serve up delicious dishes in the fast-paced, fun, and frantic Diner Bros 2.  Open a bustling restaurant in this chaotic local co-op experience: Juggle orders, cook tasty meals, and race against the clock to satisfy your hungry customers!

KNOW YOUR CUSTOMERS

In Diner Bros 2, it's not just the orders that get crazy — it’s also the Unique Customers who will keep you on your toes! Each character has their own quirks and demands that will test your multitasking skills:

  • No loitering! The Teenager thinks she can stay all day!

  • Always on the move, the Jogger wants their food quickly - and we mean fast!

  • Watch out for the sneaky Punk looking for an opportunity to dine and dash!

... and many more! It's up to you to keep the orders flowing!

UPGRADE YOUR RESTAURANT

  • Purchase New Equipment: as your diner grows, you'll need better tools to keep up with the increasing demand.

  • Optimize Your Kitchen Layout: Efficiency is key when it comes to earning cash, so make sure your kitchen is set up for smooth operation.  Or don't!

  • Expand Your Restaurant: Can you impress the Food Critic and earn the coveted 3-star award?

NEED MORE STAFF? HIRE YOUR FRIENDS!

In Diner Bros 2, you don't have to do it alone — hire servers to take some pressure off or Invite your Friends to join the chaos in full 4-player local co-op campaigns!

KEY FEATURES

  • Cook and Serve meals as fast as you can! Keep your customers happy!

  • Manage and Expand Your Restaurant for maximum efficiency

  • Get New Equipment and Learn New Recipes offering new main courses and sides

  • Serve Special Customers such as the Jogger, Teenager, Construction Worker, and Food Critic... Each with their own quirks and challenges

  • ...and Watch out for Dishonest Customers who will try to steal or eat for free!

  • Grow your Diner in the single player or local co-op Burger Bros (with more restaurants to come!)

  • Hire Staff in the single-player or 2-player campaign…

  • …or ask your friends to help out in the frantic 2-4 Player Couch Co-op experience!

name: Diner Bros 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Diner Bros are back! With the same hectic cooking and serving, and now customization of your bustling restaurant! Serve quirky customers, earn cash to buy equipment, and discover new recipes in Diner Bros 2. Team up for 4 player local co-operative fun. No friends? Hire servers!
